alert.note: Alert for Butler; Preble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 3:13PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTY IN SOUTHEASTERN INDIANA, SOUTHEASTERN WAYNE AND EASTERN UNION COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA, SOUTHERN PREBLE COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO AND NORTHWESTERN BUTLER COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN OHIO THROUGH 400 PM EDT... At 313 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over West College Corner, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Richmond, Oxford, Eaton, Camden, New Paris, West Alexandria, West College Corner, Salem, College Corner, Boston, Richmond Municipal Airport, Goodwins Corner, Oklahoma, West Florence, Cottage Grove, Morning Sun, Wheatville, Muttonville, Lake Lakengren and New Hope. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
